name: typescript-starter
description: A basic typescript app starter for newbies in 2022.

hooks.pre-commit: npm run test && npm run prettier-format && npm run lint

scripts.deploy:mavelli-ssi: npm run login 'cd prod/ssi-bot && git reset --hard && git checkout develop && git pull && yarn install && cd apps/mavelli-ssi && yarn run build && pm2 startOrRestart pm2-prod.json --env production'
scripts.deploy:mavelli-bnb: npm run login 'cd prod/ssi-bot && git reset --hard && git checkout develop && git pull && yarn install && cd apps/mavelli-bnb && yarn run build && pm2 startOrRestart pm2-prod.json --env production'
